column26: AMBER HEARD does NOT speak for all DV survivors
column33: AMBER HEARD does NOT speak for all DV survivors
column34:
Ask Amber and her team including her lawyers to STOP speaking on behalf of DV survivors.  We do not need you to speak for us. What Amber is saying is more damaging than helpful. 

Amber Heard has been proven to be an abuser, there is tons of evidence of Amber admitting to hitting her ex-husband. There was a lot not shown to the court during the defamation trial. She and her lawyers continue to parade themselves all over TV claiming the outcome of the trial was not fair, the UK trial found in her favor and the jury/judge did not her evidence. 

Amber’s mountain of evidence from dr’s is therapists notes, that is why it is considered hearsay. The UK trial did NOT include Amber, it was against a publication who printed a defamatory statement, therefore it cannot be in her favor. The UK trial does not follow the same laws and rules of the USA. The world did not hear the story. To continue to go on TV and say this is a set back for other people is offensive. 

Amber was caught is several lies. If survivors are allowed to speak it is fair to allow her ex tell his story, as a survivor. The real survivor is moving on with his life, please ask her to do the same!
column36: AMBER HEARD does NOT speak for all DV survivors
